Method Detail

getInputEncoding

public java.lang.String getInputEncoding()
Get input encoding of template. Default to UTF-8, can be specified by 'input.encoding' in velocity.properties.

getOutputEncoding

public java.lang.String getOutputEncoding()
Get output encoding of template. Default to UTF-8, can be specified by 'output.encoding' in velocity.properties.
